content:
I'm experimenting with how to add a supplemental stylesheet to a theme (optional) for a core issue. I've opened an issue in the forum for tips: https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/how-allow-add-extra-css-stylesheet-theme-codeconfig

I'll update the forum post as I figure this out myself. Seems like something that might be useful to other users in the future.
I've got the code working to add a stylesheet. I've added a config option on the settings page for theme. Now, I'm trying to save my changes to the config for the theme. That's not working.
I'm making progress. But, need to stop for today.

@StPaulTim nice work so far :) for core, there doesn't need to be an option on the settings page for the theme (or anywhere else), but I expect that will be what people want for custom or contrib themes.
